bio: Fractal Visions is an impact initiative platform reiterating the OP Stack ethos of Public Goods with QF / RPGF rewards, generated by the market fee & donations.
contributionDescription:
1. NFT & Gaming committee prior to the citizens house formation.

2. OP craft education on social media about bedrock.
This one of our earlier contributions to the OP stack.

3. We are highly active in the optimism governance forums.

4. Currently we have 10 different projects that donate directly to RetroPGF.eth address on Optimism.

5. Guild xyz “Guild Early Tester” in July 2022.
Improving safety & security of the network and OP stack ecosystem.

6. Karma HQ "Beta Tester" October 2023 GAP (Grantee Accountability Protocol)

7. Speaking in public. "Spreading the word of optimism."
“Fractal Pod” a regular spaces we host to educate others about public goods.

8. Our MVP marketplace is currently deployed on test networks.

impactDescription:
OP Gov
- Creating a lively & productive conversation with other delegates who are part of the OP collective. 
- Helping others with general questions.
- This work also consisted of reviewing proposals for the governance & the delegates of the OP collective.

Education
- Teaching others on social media about Bedrock which was the test network for what is now being used as optimism main net.

Security
- Working together with ecosystem partners & fellow RetroPGF recipients Guild xyz to help as a “Guild Early Tester” for their platform in July 2022.

Super Chain UI / UX
- BASE & Public Goods Network are also integrated with our marketplace for a super chain connection between various public goods funding mechanisms.

Public Goods Initiative
- Multiple projects we created donate to RetroPGF.eth
